javadoc.text:
* Class mapping the part of a complete state or derivative that pertains * to a specific differential equation. *
* Instances of this class are guaranteed to be immutable. *
* Index of the first equation element in complete state arrays.
* Dimension of the secondary state parameters.

javadoc.param: firstIndex index of the first equation element in complete state arrays
dimension dimension of the secondary state parameters

javadoc.text: * Get the index of the first equation element in complete state arrays.
javadoc.return: index of the first equation element in complete state arrays

javadoc.text: * Get the dimension of the secondary state parameters.
javadoc.return: dimension of the secondary state parameters

javadoc.text: * Extract equation data from a complete state or derivative array.
javadoc.param: complete complete state or derivative array from which * equation data should be retrieved
equationData placeholder where to put equation data
javadoc.throws: DimensionMismatchException if the dimension of the equation data does not * match the mapper dimension

javadoc.text: * Insert equation data into a complete state or derivative array.
javadoc.param: equationData equation data to be inserted into the complete array
complete placeholder where to put equation data (only the * part corresponding to the equation will be overwritten)
javadoc.throws: DimensionMismatchException if the dimension of the equation data does not * match the mapper dimension
